title: Double Chocolate Chunk Cookies
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '250g unsalted butter, softened', '2 large eggs, beaten', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '155g plain flour', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '165g dark brown soft sugar', '100g vanilla instant dessert mix, such as Angel Delight', '100g milk chocolate, roughly chopped', '100g white chocolate, roughly chopped']
